name: Wordungeon
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 81, with the theme of Words. Enemies can be killed to obtain items by forming words with them. Access the inventory screen by pressing ESC, move with WASD. Enemies will automatically be attacked by walking into them. A turn will pass if you move, attack, or press space. Enemies cannot attack on the same turn they move, or if they are attacked on that turn first.

Press F to toggle fullscreen.

Definitely not a finished product by any means.
